Break Barriers into any Industry

Brahmarsive aspires to democratize immersive technology. It is a no-code platform that helps convert your imagination into breathtaking visual experiences.
You have the ability to make a difference in your sector, and we have the platform to help you do so in an innovative manner. Brahmarsive is a cloud-based AR/VR platform that uses immersive technology to enhance conventional educational formats, minimize fatalities in critical surgery, improve industrial safety, and give a better customer experience.

How Brahmarsive works​

Create a unique learning experience with…

  • A cloud-based No-Code platform.
  • A highly secured workspace.
  • Templates to accelerate creation.
  • Tools for collaboration with creators across the world.
  • Access to a large inventory of real-world objects and actions.
  • Features for sharing your creations with partners.
  • Cross-functional capabilities that let you build and publish for other AR/VR delivery platforms.
  • A subscription-based payment model.

What Brahmarsive Does In

EDUCATION
HEALTH CARE
IMMERSIVE COMMERCE
OCCUPATIONAL SAFETY TRAINING
Take Learning Beyond Reality
From kindergarten teachers to college professors, educators today are challenged with the ever-growing demands of hybrid learning. They need to master the juggle of content development and delivery group discussion facilitation, assessment, and feedback-all through multiple channels. Brahmarsive is a groundbreaking tool designed to integrate learning objectives and transform traditional learning modalities into virtual reality and augmented reality for a more flexible, reusable, and measurable experience.
Break the Barriers of Medical Training
Practical, safe, and effective use of VR is not new. VR is revolutionizing the medical and healthcare industry by accurately recreating complex medical scenarios. Trainee doctors can now perform a surgery in a simulated environment, master the technique and confidently apply it in real life.
Customer Experience is Everything
Leverage the power of VR to achieve a competitive edge and accelerate sales manifolds. Create custom targeted experiences to meaningfully engage with customers and foster brand satisfaction. Digitize your physical locations, products, and services and fast-track your presence into the metaverse.
Create Hazard-free Environment with High Productivity
Research shows that VR training has minimized workplace injuries by 43% and improved the success rate by 70%? (Chaos Theory Games) VR/AR ready simulation mitigates risks and facilitates a hazard-free work environment. It places employees in a highly realistic scenario, helping them master the right behaviors without causing any harm to themselves or the property.

Innovate in your mission to educate.
Talk to us about how Brahmarsive can help you.
